property.description: Enable the PSK based ciphersuite modes in SSL / TLS.
Enable the DHE-PSK based ciphersuite modes in SSL / TLS.
Enable the ECDHE-PSK based ciphersuite modes in SSL / TLS.
Enable the RSA-PSK based ciphersuite modes in SSL / TLS.
Enable the RSA-only based ciphersuite modes in SSL / TLS.
Enable the DHE-RSA based ciphersuite modes in SSL / TLS.
Enable the ECDHE-RSA based ciphersuite modes in SSL / TLS.
Enable the ECDHE-ECDSA based ciphersuite modes in SSL / TLS.
Enable the ECDH-ECDSA based ciphersuite modes in SSL / TLS.
Enable the ECDH-RSA based ciphersuite modes in SSL / TLS.
Enable the ECJPAKE based ciphersuite modes in SSL / TLS.
Define Custom Ciphersuites(comma separated from ssl_ciphersuites.h) Macro
Custom Ciphersuites(comma separated from ssl_ciphersuites.h)
Define Maximum number of intermediate CAs in a verification chain. Macro
Enable sending of alert messages in case of encountered errors as per RFC.
Enable support for the DTLS Connection ID extension
Enable asynchronous external private key operations in SSL. This allows
Enable the debug messages in SSL module for all issues.
Enable support for Encrypt-then-MAC, RFC 7366.
Enable support for Extended Master Secret, aka Session Hash
This option controls the availability of the API mbedtls_ssl_get_peer_cert()
Enable support for TLS renegotiation.
Enable support for RFC 6066 max_fragment_length extension in SSL.
Enable support for TLS 1.2 (and DTLS 1.2 if DTLS is enabled).
Enable support for TLS 1.3
Enable TLS 1.3 middlebox compatibility mode
Enable support for DTLS (all available versions).
Enable support for RFC 7301 Application Layer Protocol Negotiation.
Enable support for the anti-replay mechanism in DTLS.
Enable support for HelloVerifyRequest on DTLS servers.
Enable server-side support for clients that reconnect from the same port.
Enable support for RFC 5077 session tickets in SSL.
Enable support for RFC 6066 server name indication (SNI) in SSL.
If set, this enables the X.509 API 'mbedtls_x509_crt_verify_with_ca_cb()'
Disable mbedtls_x509_*_info() and related APIs.
Enable parsing and verification of X.509 certificates, CRLs and CSRS
Enable the debug functions.
Enable the TCP and UDP over IPv6/IPv4 networking routines.
Enable simple SSL cache implementation.
Enable basic implementation of DTLS cookies for hello verification.
Enable an implementation of TLS server-side callbacks for session tickets.
Enable the SSL/TLS client code.
Enable the SSL/TLS server code.
Enable the generic SSL/TLS code.
Enable X.509 core for using certificates.
Enable X.509 certificate parsing.
Enable X.509 CRL parsing.
Enable X.509 Certificate Signing Request (CSR) parsing.
Enable X.509 core for creating certificates.
Enable creating X.509 certificates.
Enable creating X.509 Certificate Signing Requests (CSR).
Define Maximum length (in bytes) of incoming plaintext fragments.
Maximum length (in bytes) of incoming plaintext fragments.
Define The maximum length of CIDs used for incoming DTLS messages. Macro
The maximum length of CIDs used for incoming DTLS messages.
Define The maximum length of CIDs used for outgoing DTLS messages. Macro
The maximum length of CIDs used for outgoing DTLS messages.
This option controls the use of record plaintext padding in TLS 1.3 and when using the Connection ID extension in DTLS 1.2. Macro
A value of 1 means that no padding will be used for outgoing records.
Define This option controls the use of record plaintext padding Macro
This option controls the use of record plaintext padding
Define Maximum length (in bytes) of outgoing plaintext fragments. Macro
Maximum length (in bytes) of outgoing plaintext fragments.
Define Maximum number of heap-allocated bytes for the purpose of Macro
Maximum number of heap-allocated bytes for the purpose of
Define SSL Cached Default Timeout Macro
SSL Cached Default Timeout
Define SSL Cache Default Max Entries Macro
SSL Cache Default Max Entries
Define Max size of TLS pre-shared keys, in bytes (default 256 bits) Macro
Max size of TLS pre-shared keys, in bytes (default 256 bits)
Define Default expiration delay of DTLS cookies, in seconds if HAVE_TIME, or in number of cookies issued Macro
Default expiration delay of DTLS cookies, in seconds if HAVE_TIME, or in number of cookies issued
Set this configuration option to make Mbed TLS use a different value for CID extension
Set this configuration option to make Mbed TLS use a different value
Maximum number of intermediate CAs in a verification chain.
Define Maximum length of a path/filename string in bytes including the null terminator character ('\0'). Macro
Maximum length of a path/filename string in bytes including the null terminator character ('\0').

constraint.display: MBEDTLS_THREADING_C in MbedTLS (Crypto Only) must be defined when using MbedTLS under MbedTLS (Crypto Only)|Common|General|MBEDTLS_THREADING_C.
MBEDTLS_THREADING_ALT in MbedTLS (Crypto Only) must be defined when using MbedTLS under MbedTLS (Crypto Only)|Common|General|MBEDTLS_THREADING_ALT.
MBEDTLS_ECDH_C in MbedTLS (Crypto Only) must be defined when using MbedTLS under MbedTLS (Crypto Only)|Common|Public Key Cryptography(PKC)|ECC|MBEDTLS_ECDH_C.
MBEDTLS_ECP_C in MbedTLS (Crypto Only) must be defined when using MbedTLS under MbedTLS (Crypto Only)|Common|Public Key Cryptography(PKC)|ECC|MBEDTLS_ECP_C.

MBEDTLS_ECP_DP_SECP256R1_ENABLED in MbedTLS (Crypto Only) must be defined when using MbedTLS under MbedTLS (Crypto Only)|Common|Public Key Cryptography(PKC)|ECC|Curves|MBEDTLS_ECP_DP_SECP256R1_ENABLED.
Not supported in Azure RTOS, use NetX Secure instead.

requires.display: Requires FreeRTOS or Bare Metal project
